mean_cn: n.恭维，问候（读作/ˈkɑmpləmənt/）；  v.赞美，祝贺（读作/ˈkɑmpləˌmɛnt/）
mean_en: a remark that expresses praise or admiration of somebody; polite words or good wishes, especially when used to express praise and admiration
sentence: The couple were satisfied with their dinner and paid the chef a compliment.
sentence_trans: 这对夫妇对晚餐很满意，还称赞了厨师。
